name: Glycerona Handcreme classic
composition: INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Urea, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Parfum, Carbomer, Allantoin, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Terpineol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Amyl Salicylate, Sodium Hydroxide
